Author: jamesbritt
Content:
I've been trying out Joost off and on for about a moth or three, but the performance is sluggish. on my WinXP box. That makes it extra annoying to hunt around for something worth watching.

Democracy TV (soon, I think, to be called Miro) is somewhat better, not least because it runs on my Ubuntu-laden laptop. But it also has a more interesting range of content.
